New films and DVDs for August 2015

Cinderella

Kenneth Branagh directs a sumptuous, live-action Disney production of Cinderella, starring Lily James and Richard Madden.

Insurgent

Shailene Woodley and Ansel Elgort (reunited after The Fault in our Stars) feature in the Divergent

Get hard

Comedy following the unlikely bond between a millionaire (Will Ferrell) as his car washer (Kevin Hart) prepares him for prison.

Woman in gold

A Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) seeks to take back artwork that Nazis stoleÂ from her family in WWII.

The DUFF

In this high-school comedy, Bianca (Mae Whitman) finds out she is labelled as the Duff (Designated Ugly Fat Friend).

Run all night

Crime-thriller with Liam Neeson, who must save his son from being killed by the mob.
